<MuramasaIII@...> writes:

>> I understand that red saya were banned on low ranking samurai, along
>> with other red articles of clothing

> not always true.........
> case in point, if they belong to the Ii clan, they are expected to 
> wear red.

I don't know anything more about it other than the passing mention
around about 1624 ... a bunch of things were banned at that point. Red
saya specifically, red clothing if I remember correctly, maybe at this
point katana on non-samurai. I don't recall there being any exceptions
to the list, but doesn't mean that there wasn't one. 

Anyone have anything more substantive on this?

- darcy
